version_description:
- BMW & Mini customizations and advanced diagnostics (March 2007 and newer build date)
- More customizations for VW/Audi/Seat/Skoda, incl. needle sweep, footwell lighting, etc.
- New Toyota/Lexus/Scion customizations, improved diagnostics
- Bug fixes

- Cornering lights for VW/Audi/Seat/Skoda
- Lighting settings for BMW E60/E61, addt'l settings for E90, etc.
- Enable opening/closing Audi A5 convertible top via remote
- Audi A1 & Q3 needle sweep, seat belt chime, etc.
- Additional setting to enable Audi A4, A5 & Q5 footwell lights
- Improved communication stability
- Improved Toyota/Lexus/Scion fault code checking
- Instructions/hints for changing certain customizations
- Bug fixes

- New tool to check if your VW / Audi is affected by the recently-exposed emissions issues
- More settings for some BMW models
- Facebook sharing integration

- Updated "Is my VW or Audi affected" tool (also works for SEAT & Skoda)
- Audi A6 C6 facelift - needle sweep, seat belt beep, scale illumination, etc.
- Auto-fold mirrors for Audi A4 B8, etc.
- VW panoramic roof customizations
- Audi TT Mk1 customizations
- MMI 4G/RMC hidden menu
- Configure ding when headlights left on (Audi B8)
- More customizations for more BMW models
- BMW beep/blink on lock/unlock
- BMW E90 & E60 digital speed display
- BMW ding on key in ignition
- BMW comfort-fold mirrors delay
- BMW comfort turn signal count
- BMW comfort eject key
- BMW DRL settings for cars with FRM2 module
- BMW alarm tilt & ultrasonic activation
- BMW momentary fuel consumption in OBC
- Toyota/Lexus easy-exit seat movement
- improved Bluetooth LE connection

In v3.0:
- New user interface
- VW/Audi/Seat/Skoda service indicator reset
- VW/Audi electronic parking brake release/service tool
- More customizations for more supported models
- App translated to German
- New flexible pricing for Pro features (1-week pass or yearly subscription)
NOTE: if you already had the old Pro Package, you will continue to have unlimited access to all features in the app!

New in v3.1:
- 2016 VW Jetta customizations
- Audi S4/S5/RS4/RS5 (B8) launch control count
- Audi A6/A7/A8 (C7 & D4) service indicator reset & instrument customizations
- BMW/Mini: much faster diagnostics & new customizations
- Toyota/Lexus: new power back door settings
- Detect defective adapters & low-voltage situations
- UI improvements & bug fixes

New in v3.1.1
- Bug fixes related to low-voltage situations & diagnostics

New in v3.1:
- 2016 VW Jetta customizations
- Audi S4/S5/RS4/RS5 (B8) launch control count
- Audi A6/A7/A8 (C7 & D4) service indicator reset & instrument customizations
- BMW/Mini: much faster diagnostics & new customizations
- Toyota/Lexus: new power back door settings
- Detect defective adapters & low-voltage situations
- UI improvements & bug fixes

New in v3.2:

- Customizations for Golf Mk7, Passat B8, A3 8V, Leon 5F, Octavia 5E, Superb B8, Polo/Fabia/Rapid/Ibiza/Toledo 6C, Transporter T6
- EPB tool for Golf Mk7, Passat B8, A3 8V, etc.
- Golf Mk6 / Passat B7 headlight brightness
- Free 1-month Pro trial for Carista adapter owners
- Bug fixes

If you like our additions, please rate us on the App Store!

- More customizations for Golf Mk7, Passat B8, A3 8V, Leon 5F, Octavia 5E, Superb B8, Polo/Fabia/Rapid/Ibiza/Toledo 6C
- DRL brightness adjustment for A4, A5, A6, A7, Q5
- Disable auto start/stop for A4, A5, A6, A7, Q5, Mk7, 6C

If you like our additions, please rate/review us on the App Store. Thanks!

- More customizations
- Russian translation
- Bug fixes

- More customizations
- Russian translation
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes

- Bug fixes

- ADS customizations for Audi A4/A5 B8
- Trunk pop customization for VW Golf Mk5
- Auto-locking customizations for Golf Mk7 / Audi A3 8V
- Bug fixes

- ADS customizations for Audi A4/A5 B8
- Trunk pop customization for VW Golf Mk5
- Auto-locking customizations for Golf Mk7 / Audi A3 8V
- Bug fixes

-Kiwi 3 adapters now supported
-Soundaktor volume for VWs & Audis
-Rear hatch pop for Golf Mk7.5
-Start screen logos, cornering lights & pace car lights for Mk7
-Rain/light sensor for BMWs
